isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - DETROIT DIESEL SERIES 60 - 1992-1993 - SERVICE TOOLS AND INFORMATION

svcproc.title: MPSI PROLINK ELECTRONIC SERVICE TOOL (EST)
svcproc.para: For the Series 60 engines, use the ProLink EST and Detroit Diesel service manuals for diagnostic assistance. The Prolink EST is available at International Service Centers.
The Series 60 engines in International vehicles have the standard 8-way diagnostic connector used on all International vehicles with electronic engine controllers.
